channel.title: Adding requirements to a object
channel.description:
[b]first of all i got zenithscape source and client :p[/b]
hy guys, does anyone know how to add requirements to the object mysterious cape in the Varrock museum like real runescape
So if you click on the mysterious cape that the requirements in your chat bar gets and if you have done all these requirements, for example: all skills 99 and 120 dungeon ring All quest completed unlock all tracks msic ...
that you can get the completionist cape for 5m gp
and then if you completionist cape and if you then for the second time that you click the requireùents chalk for completionist cape (t)

item.title: Adding requirements to a object
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Give the object a dialogue and add requirements to it, such as;

if(objectID == xxxx){
if(totalLevel != xxxx || playerEquipment[playerRing] != dungeonringID || quest1 != 15){
//send dialogue stating they cannot receive the cape
}
if(totalLevel == xxxx && playerEquipment[playerRing] == dungeonringID && quest1 == 15){
/** 
 *  -  send dialogue stating that they must pay 5 million coins for a cape
 *  -  options being "No, I cannot afford that!", "Yes, please!"
 *  -  make the options work
 */
}
}

You’ll have to add the actual restrictions yourself because I’m not familiar with zenith, but this should give you the main idea.

Read full topic

first of all i got zenithscape source and client
